name: Pitch black darkness
description:
Game created for Global Game jam on 31/1/2021

Help young Aura Kalj find her way out of the dark tunnels before her light fades out. You can map out your moves to keep track of your progress through the labyrinth of darkness. The dark constantly eats at your light but you may find more littered around the darks. But remember to keep an eye out for the shadow that chases you, for the shadow can extinguish your light with a single touch, leaving you forever lost...

Controls : WASD to move the character
